full_summary:
# EA003-240944 - Consultant Services - NAFC G18 and Pumphouse Roof Replacement

[English]
## Solicitation Details

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for architectural consultant services to design and implement roofing replacement repairs at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre (NAFC) facility, specifically at Module G18 and the Pumphouse. The work is to be carried out according to the specifications outlined in the RFP.

## Tender Information

* Solicitation number: WS4334451412
* Tender closing date: 2023-12-19T14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: 2024-01-05
* Procurement method: Competitive - Selective tendering
* Selection criteria: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price

## Trade Agreements

This opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Grant Stewart
* Phone: [Not available]
* Email: [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

## Tender Attachment

No additional documents are provided as part of this tender.

## Notes

This opportunity is only available to invited firms with Supply Arrangement (SA) E0225-152290 - Architecture, Level A2 Complexity, Newfoundland list.

# Description of Work

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invite you to submit a proposal to provide architectural consultant services for the roofing replacement repairs at the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Centre (NAFC) facility. The services required include the design and implementation of the roofing replacement repairs, and the completion of any additional work necessary to complete the project.

[French]
## Détails de la consultation

Cela est une demande de propositions (RFP) pour les services de consultant en architecture pour concevoir et mettre en œuvre des réparations de remplacement de la toiture du Centre des pê
